Description:
Lead the Key Account sales team and manage day to day operations within budgeted guidelines and to the highest standards.
Set monthly sales targets, KPI’s, sales objectives for Key Account team.
Review and make sales analysis on daily, monthly basis (salesman - Customer - Item - Category) and take actions based on it.
Follow up daily customer’s LPO’s, deliveries and returns.
Set weekly meetings with supervisors and salesmen, Communicate new plans, monthly targets, sales reports.
Set the annual forecast for Key Account (SKU, category, customer).
Prepare the route plan for salesmen and sales supervisors to ensure the best product coverage for Key Accounts branches.
Prepare the monthly plan for promotions and special offers along with Buying/Purchasing Managers.
Participate in the creation of POS material and ensure that it is applied in stores.
Make Control on FOC, Returns, debit notes and credit notes.
Plan and execute marketing plans, promotions, taste sampling to increase brand awareness.
Negotiate annual contracts, monthly rental contracts, special events participation with
Buying/Category Managers.
Set Annual budget, Target, Forecast for Key Accounts.
Prepare ROI report for each account quarterly.
Participate in business development, product development plans, new products launching, P&L monthly analysis.
Set sales objectives and project expected sales volume for existing and new products.
Support the creation of a business plan for each individual sales area / person, ensuring a focus on core customers, prospects, and vertical markets.
Supervising staff to ensure that they perform the correct tasks to prescribed standards.
Monitoring random negotiations to discern whether employees are adopting effective sales techniques.
Ensuring that staff members are reimbursed for work-related purchases.
Maintaining contact with clients to better understand and fulfill their needs.
Using insights derived from performance reviews and market research to tweak systems, as needed.Skills
Skills:
Communication Skills
Leadership
Relationship Building
Analytical & Problem Solving
Negotiation
Market Knowledge
